publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7695 Jamie Hepburn: Cuts to First Bus Services across Central Scotland—That the Parliament condemns the decision by First Bus to implement, from 16 January 2011, what are believed to be significant cuts to bus services across central Scotland; further notes that, as part of the scheduled changes, a number of services are to be withdrawn, including the X2 Glasgow-Cumbernauld route, and that other services, including the 36 and 36A Glasgow-Chryston/Abronhill route, are to operate on a reduced frequency; considers that these changes will significantly limit the travel options of bus users across central Scotland, and calls on First Bus to reconsider these service cuts. Supported by: Gil Paterson*, Stuart McMillan*, Bob Doris*, Alasdair Allan*, Bill Kidd*, Sandra White*
S3M-7695 Cuts to First Bus Services across Central Scotland (lodged on 12 January 2011) Kenneth Gibson*, Elaine Smith*
